caption.p: Daily mean virus serum titers (log 10 PFU/mL + standard deviation) in different avian species each inoculated with 1500 PFU of SLEV-prME/WNV.IC, SLEV/IMP115, SLEV.IC, WNV-prME/SLEV.IC and WNV.IC viruses were assessed over 1â€“7 days post-inoculation: (A) California house finches, (B) California house sparrows, (C) Colorado house sparrows, (D) American crows. The detection limit (LOD) for this assay was 1.7 log 10 PFU/mL.
